availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Andrew J. Johnson (Allen County, Kentucky, merchant and deputy sheriff.)

body.p: Allen County, Kentucky, farm laborer, merchant, and deputy sheriff. Allen County, Kentucky, native. Son of John Johnson and N. Johnson. Married to Sallie E. Johnson. Father of Anna L. Johnson and William S. Johnson. Farm laborer in Allen County, Kentucky, in 1850. Merchant in Allen County in 1860. Deputy sheriff in Allen County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Allen County, p. 316B-317A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Allen County, Gainesville, p. 318.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United Sates(1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Allen County, Scottsville, p. 177A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Allen County, KY, February 1864, p. 187.
